english: He pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit extortion .
chinese: 他供认了犯有合谋敲诈罪。

english: He claimed that donald was en route to miami beach to deliver the money to a third conspirator .
chinese: 他当时供称唐纳德正在前往迈阿密海滩把这笔钱交给第三个合谋者。

english: The wandering winds, even the sun and rain, seemed to conspire in favour of so clever and hard-working a man .
chinese: 东飘西荡的风，甚至太阳和雨水，似乎都在合谋为一个如此聪明、如此勤奋的男人造福。

english: He plots with secretary to cheat the company
chinese: 他和秘书合谋来欺骗公司。

english: The cause of audit conspiring and its governance countermeasures
chinese: 审计合谋的成因与治理对策
合谋造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He was suspected of complicity in her murder
Our working theory is that they conspired
chinese: 我们设想应该是他们合谋

english: . . . you were always good at cahooting
An analysis on the optimality of wavering or not wavering auditing collusion
chinese: 允许或制止审计合谋的最优性分析

english: You were always good at cahooting
Claims you knew all about it
Approach two arabs on an airpiane and accuse them of criminai conspiracy
chinese: 要我在飞机上处理两个阿拉伯人并指控他们合谋犯罪

english: A game analysis of the collusion of players involved in large construction project
chinese: 大型基建工程项目业主等方合谋的博弈分析

english: De - enchantment of fashion interpretation of the conspiracy among fashion , modernity and consumption
chinese: 现代性与消费的当代合谋的解读

english: But that would imply a truly impressive conspiracy between the 16 agencies that signed the report
chinese: 但那将意味着签署报告的16家情报部门合谋撒谎。
